page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: Most people in our area seem to go to work by {car}.Some people have two and travelling by car is the most popular way of getting to work.People work all over Northumberland.Many work in Morpeth, Ashington, Newcastle,Hepscott and for the N.C.B.at the nearby pits.The {train}is not a popular way of going to work although early morning trains leave at 6.59am, 7.54am and 8.25am.It only takes 25 minutes to get to Newcastle.The {roads}in our area are the A1,which goes from London to Edinburgh.It is a very fast road.The A192 goes from Tynemouth to Morpeth and the A196 goes from Ashington to Morpeth.The {garage}at Clifton sells both petrol and Renault cars.{Buses}are used more often than trains.A few people go to work on {bikes}or walk.
